name: NumLet
description:
NumLet is an addictive game with two different test, one with Numbers and other with Letters:

- NUM Time: you have to get the target number or an approximate number with 6 numbers given. Make addition / subtraction / multiplication / division to get the Target Number.
- LET Time: you have to make 3 words with 9 given letters. Remenber Big Word/Big Score, Fake Word/Bad Score.
- Every time you finish a round can see the possible solutions, words or operations to reach the exact number.

The tension in the game is the time, when this reaches zero ... GAME OVER, but you can get Seconds if you get good scores.

IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS, TRY IT BECAUSE IT IS FREE !!!!!

- ONLINE MODE to compete against your friends and against the world and become the BigBrain.
- LeaderBoards (Gamecenter)
- 4 languages (English, Spanish, French, German)
- Choose your preferred language for the Letters Test
- Play alone or against the world.
- 3 game modes, NUMLET, LET, NUM
- Twitter and Facebook, share with the world your intelligence.
